item.title: Tesla sales cratered in California for 7 straight quarters while rivals Toyota and Honda surge, report shows
item.description: The once-unstoppable electric-vehicle maker saw new car and truck registrations tumble 18.3% compared to the first half of last year, according to Exp...

item.title: Exclusive: Mark Cuban says AI will be a baseline skill like email or Excel in 5 years and entrepreneurs should embrace it or get left behind
item.description: The billionaire investor told Fortune new AI assistants available to entrepreneurs will help turn “solo founders into full teams.”

item.title: Eventual, a climate fintech, raises $7.5 million seed round from AlleyCorp and Upfront Ventures
item.description: Eventual’s AI model predicts how insurance prices will evolve for any given U.S. property as far ahead as five years in the future.

item.title: GM’s $1.1 billion tariff hit bolsters mounting evidence that Americans are the ones footing the bill for Trump’s import taxes
item.description: “The top-down macroevidence seems clear: Americans are mostly paying for the tariffs,” a Deutsche Bank analyst said in a note published Tuesday.

item.title: Halliburton CEO: Oil and gas markets are “softer” than expected and will remain weak for all of 2025
item.description: The oil sector braces for a bearish back half of 2025 while remaining optimistic for the long run.
